name: Run Though It
description:
Avoid the notes that rhythmically spawn to block and push you back from running through the music. Score points by picking up the sharps (♯) and double sharps (), try to avoid the flats (♭) and use the naturals (♮) to your advantage :P

Scoring enough points will earn you a bronze bass clef, a silver alto clef or a golden treble clef.

Controls:

  • Up - jump up the staff
  • Down - drop down the staff
  • Run left and right
  • Mobile has buttons at the bottom

This game was made in Godot and is using a music manager plugin I made (a work in progress) for the engine.

This game is for the OST Jam Vol. 2 game jam.
